actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 2 of the National Housing Act to increase the maximum principal amount of home improvement loans which may be insure thereunder and to increase the maximum maturity of such loans.

summary.text: Increases from $5,000 to $10,000 the maximum principal amount of home improvement loans which may be insured under the National Housing Act. Increases the maximum maturity of such loans.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2 of the National Housing Act to increase the maximum principal amount of home improvement loans which may be insure thereunder and to increase the maximum maturity of such loans.
